section.title: The core library
section.para:
Waf is based on 12 modules which constitute the core library
The core library
Module Role
Build Define the build context class, which holds the data for one build (paths, configuration data)
Configure Contains the configuration context class, which is used for launching configuration tests, and the extension system
Constants The constants used in the project
Environment Contains a dictionary class which support a lightweight copy scheme and provides persistence services
Logs Logging system
Node Filesystem representation
Options Command-line option processing
Runner.py Functions for executing system programs, and the threaded task execution system (producer-consumer)
Scripting.py The entry point of the Waf application, use the command-line for launching the configuration, the build, etc
TaskGen The task generator system, and its extension system based on method addition
Task The task classes, and the task containers.
Utils Support library needed by many parts of the code
